AoS - Hedonites of Slaanesh 2000pts - The Immaculate Choir (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Chaos - Slaanesh) [2,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Uncategorised

      • Fane of Slaanesh

        Categories: SCENERY, SLAANESH

        Unit Abilities: Locus of Savagery, Power of Slaanesh


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Locus of Savagery At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly CHAOS SLAANESH HERO within 6" of this terrain feature to make a sacrifice. If you do so, that Hero suffers 1 mortal wound, and you must roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2+ you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO until your next hero phase.

        If that HERO has an artefact of power, they can sacrifice that instead of suffering 1 mortal wound. If they do so, that artefact of power can no longer be used (if a weapon was picked when the artefact of power was selected, that weapon reverts to normal). However, on a roll of 2+, you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO for the rest of the battle instead of only until your next hero phase.
        Power of Slaanesh If you spend depravity points to summon a unit to the battlefield, and that unit is set up wholly within 12" of this terrain feature, you receive D3 depravity points after that unit has been set up.

    • Leader [500pts]

      • Infernal Enrapturess [140pts]

        Selections: 4. Doppelganger Cloak

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, INFERNAL ENRAPTURESS, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Doppelganger Cloak, Unit: Infernal Enrapturess, Unit Abilities: Discordant Disruption, Harmonic Alignment, Versatile Instrument, Weapon: Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody, Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast, Ravaging Claw


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Doppelganger Cloak Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that the bearer will put on the cloak. If you do so, the bearer cannot be chosen as the target of attacks made with melee weapons unless the bearer has made any attacks earlier in that phase. Malign Sorcery; Official Errata, December 2018
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Infernal Enrapturess 6"5105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Discordant Disruption Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that WIZARD suffers D3 mortal wound after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.
        Harmonic Alignment At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 depravity point for each friendly INFERNAL ENRAPTURESS that is on the battlefield and part of a Slaanesh army.
        Versatile Instrument Before attacking with a heartstring lyre, choose either the Cacophonous Melody or Euphonic Blast missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

        Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody Missile18"63+4+-11

      • Keeper of Secrets [360pts]

        Selections: 2. Progeny of Damnation, 6. Sword of Judgement, Sinistrous Hand

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, KEEPER OF SECRETS, MONSTER, SLAANESH, WIZARD, GREATER DAEMON, Behemoth, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Sword of Judgement, Command Abilities: Excess of Violence, Keeper of Secrets Wounds: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Magic: Magic, Spell: Cacophonic Choir, Progeny of Damnation, Unit: Keeper of Secrets, Unit Abilities: Dark Temptations, Delicate Precision, Sinistrous Hand, Weapon: Elegant Greatblade, Impaling Claws, Sinistrous Hand


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Sword of Judgement Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons to be a Sword of Judgement. If the hit roll for an attack with that weapon against a HERO or MONSTER is 6+, that attack inflicts D6 mortal wounds and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Excess of Violence You can use this command ability in the combat phase, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with. If you do so, pick 1 friendly HEDONITE unit that has already fought once in that combat phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be selected to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same combat phase.
        Keeper of Secrets Wounds MoveElegant GreatbladeImpaling Claws Ref
        00-03 14"55
        04-06 12"34
        07-09 10"33
        10-12 8"23
        13+ 6"22
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Magic 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Cacophonic Choir
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Cacophonic Choir 6Roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of the caster that has a Bravery characteristic of less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Progeny of Damnation 7Pick 1 friendly DAEMON HEDONITE HERO within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. You can heal D3 wounds allocated to that HERO. If the casting roll was 10+, you can heal D6 wounds allocated to that HERO instead of D3.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Keeper of Secrets *14104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Dark Temptations At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model and ask your opponent if they wish that HERO to accept temptation. If they refuse, that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. If they accept, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO. Then, at the start of the next combat phase, roll a dice. On 1-3, that HERO no longer receives this modifier to their hit rolls. On 4-6, that HERO is slain.
        Delicate Precision If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).
        Sinistrous Hand If this model is armed with a Sinistrous Hand, at the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to this model. If any enemy HEROES were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D6 wounds allocated to this model instead.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Elegant Greatblade Melee2"*3+3+-12
        Impaling Claws Melee3"23+3+-2*
        Sinistrous Hand Melee1"12+3+-11

      • Chaos Marauders [120pts]

        Selections: 20 Chaos Marauders [120pts], Barbarian Flails, Darkwood Shields, Drummer, Slaanesh

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS MARAUDERS, Battleline, SLAANESH

        Unit: Chaos Marauders, Unit Abilities: Barbarian Hordes, Darkwood Shields, Drummer, Marauder Chieftain, Weapon: Barbarian Flail

        • Icon Bearer

          Selections: Damned Icon

          Unit Abilities: Damned Icon


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Chaos Marauders 6"156+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Barbarian Hordes Roll a dice before a unit of Chaos Marauders piles in. Add 1 to the roll if the unit includes 20 or more models. If the result is 4 or more, add 1 to the results of any hit rolls for the unit's attacks until the end of the phase. If the result is 6 or more, add 1 to the result of any wound rolls as well.
        Damned Icon You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for models in a unit that contains one or more Damned Icons.
        Darkwood Shields Units carrying Darkwood Shields have a save of 5+ rather than 6+.
        Drummer If the unit includes any Drummers, add 1 to its run and charge rolls.
        Marauder Chieftain The leader of this unit is the Marauder Chieftain. He makes 2 attacks rather than 1.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Barbarian Flail Melee1"15+3+-1

      • Battalion: Epicurean Raiders [780pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Perfect Destroyers

        • Daemonettes [300pts]

          Selections: 3x 10 Daemonettes, Hornblower, Icon Bearer, Standard Bearer

          Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SLAANESH, Battleline

          Unit: Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Alluress, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Icon Bearer, Lithe and Swift, Standard Bearers, Weapon: Piercing Claws

        • Daemonettes [300pts]

          Selections: 3x 10 Daemonettes, Icon Bearer, Standard Bearer

          Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SLAANESH, Battleline

          Unit: Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Alluress, Icon and Standard Bearers, Icon Bearer, Lithe and Swift, Standard Bearers, Weapon: Piercing Claws


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Perfect Destroyers If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a DAEMONETTE from this battalion is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Daemonettes of Slaanesh 6"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Alluress The leader of this unit is the Alluress. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Alluress' Piercing Claws.
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. In addition, 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer.
        Icon Bearer If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for a unit that includes any Icon Bearers is 1, you can add D6 models to that unit, and no models from that unit will flee in that battleshock phase.
        Lithe and Swift This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Standard Bearers You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by a unit that includes any Standard Bearers.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Piercing Claws Melee1"24+4+-11

      • Battalion: Supreme Sybarites [480pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Ruling Cabal

        • Keeper of Secrets [360pts]

          Selections: 1. Strength of Godhood, 3. Sliverslash, 3. Slothful Stupor, 3.True Child of Slaanesh, 5. Phantasmagoria, General, Sinistrous Hand

          Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, KEEPER OF SECRETS, MONSTER, SLAANESH, WIZARD, GREATER DAEMON, Leader, Artefact, General

          Artefact: Sliverslash, Command Abilities: Excess of Violence, Strength of Godhood, Command Trait: True Child of Slaanesh, Keeper of Secrets Wounds: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Magic: Magic, Spell: Cacophonic Choir, Phantasmagoria, Slothful Stupor, Unit: Keeper of Secrets, Unit Abilities: Dark Temptations, Delicate Precision, Sinistrous Hand, Weapon: Elegant Greatblade, Impaling Claws, Sinistrous Hand


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Sliverslash Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapons. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Ruling Cabal At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice. If the roll is less than or equal to the number of HEORES from this battalion that are on the battlefield, you receive 1 command point.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Excess of Violence You can use this command ability in the combat phase, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with. If you do so, pick 1 friendly HEDONITE unit that has already fought once in that combat phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be selected to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same combat phase.
        Strength of Godhood Once per combat phase, in step 4 of the attack sequence, you can add D3 to the damage inflicted by 1 successful attack made by this general.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        True Child of Slaanesh At the start of the first battle round, before determining which player has the first turn, roll 6 dice. You receive 1 depravity point for each roll of 5+.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Slaanesh

          Selections: Pretenders Host

          Battalion Organisation: Pretenders Hedonite Host, Battle Trait: Euphoric Killers, Feast of Depravities, Heir to the Throne, Hosts of Slaanesh, Locus of Diversion, Warlord Supreme, Depravity Point Table: (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets, (02) 3 Seeker Chariots, (03) 30 Daemonettes, (04) 1 Contorted Epitome, (05) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot, (06) 3 Feinds), (07) 20 Daemonettes, (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer, (09) 1 Exalted Chariot, (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh, (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot, (12) 1 Hellflayer, (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh, (14) 1 Seeker Chariot, (15) 5 Seekers, (16) 10 Daemonettes


        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Pretenders Hedonite Host A Supreme Sybarites battalion in a PRETENDERS HOST army must have only 1 CHAOS SLAANESH HERO instead of 3-6.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Euphoric Killers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a CHAOS SLAANESH model is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. If the attacking model’s unit has 20 or more models, its attacks inflict 3 hits on an unmodified hit roll of 6 instead.
        Feast of Depravities You can summon units of SLAANESH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough depravity points (DPs). Each time a wound or mortal wound is inflicted on an enemy model by an attack made by a friendly SLAANESH HERO or a spell cast by a friendly SLAANESH HERO, and that enemy model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point. In addition, every time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly SLAANESH HERO and not negated, and that friendly model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point.

        If you have any depravity points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the list below to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of depravity points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough depravity points to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly SLAANESH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of depravity points you have immediately after it has been set up.
        Heir to the Throne If the general of a PRETENDERS HOST army is a HERO, they have 2 different command traits instead of 1 command trait. If you randomly generate the traits, roll again if the second result is the same as the first. In addition, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee and missile weapons by friendly PRETENDERS HOST units while they have 10 or more models.
        Hosts of Slaanesh After you have chosen the Slaanesh allegiance for your army, you must also choose a Host of Slaanesh keyword for your army. You can choose for your army to be an INVADERS HOST, a PRETENDERS HOST, or a GODSEEKERS HOST. All units in your army gain the keyword of the host that you have chosen. All units with that keyword benefit from the host’s allegiance abilities, which are presented on the following pages, in addition to the allegiance abilities they have for being from a Slaanesh army.
        Locus of Diversion At the end of the charge phase, each friendly HEDONITE HERO that is within 6" of an enemy unit can create a locus of diversion. If they do so, pick 1 enemy unit that is within 6" of that HEDONITE HERO and roll a dice, adding 2 if that HEDONITE HERO is a GREATER DAEMON. On a 4+, that enemy unit fights at the end of the following combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight in that combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same charge phase (whether the roll is successful or not).

        If a unit that is affected by this battle trait is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the following combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Warlord Supreme At the start of your hero phase, you receive D3 depravity points if your general is within 3" of any enemy units. If your general is within 3" of 3 or more enemy units at the start of your hero phase, you receive D6 depravity points instead of D3.
        Depravity Point Table Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 30
        (02) 3 Seeker Chariots 30
        (03) 30 Daemonettes 25
        (04) 1 Contorted Epitome 18
        (05) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 18
        (06) 3 Feinds) 18

    • Malign Sorcery [120pts]

      • Endless Spell: Chronomatic Cogs [80pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, AZYR, CHRONOMANTIC COGS, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Chronomatic Cogs, Unit Abilities: Mechanisms of Time


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Chronomatic Cogs 7If successfully cast, set up a Chronomantic Cogs model wholly within 12" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Mechanisms of Time In their controlling player’s hero phase, a single Wizard within 9" of this model may manipulate the cogs to increase or decrease the flow of time. They may do this in the same phase as the Chronomantic Cogs are set up. If they do so, choose one of the effects opposite. The effect lasts until their next hero phase, or until an enemy Wizard chooses to manipulate the cogs. Speed Up Time: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of all units on the battlefield. In addition, add 2 to charge rolls for all units on the battlefield. Slow Down Time: The wizard manipulating the cogs can cast 1 additional spell in this hero phase. In addition, re-roll failed save rolls for that wizard.

      • Endless Spell: Soulsnare Shackles [40pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, SOULSNARE SHACKLES, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Soulsnare Shackles, Unit Abilities: Bound for the Great Oubliette, Empowered by Shyish


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Soulsnare Shackles 5If successfully cast, set up a Soulsnare Shackles model wholly within 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third Soulsnare Shackles models wholly within 6" of the first.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bound for the Great Oubliette At the start of the movement phase, roll a dice for each unit within 6" of any Soulsnare Shackles models. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, the second and third Soulsnare Shackles models can be set up wholly within 9" of the first, instead of 6".

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
